originalText.text: I'm pretty picky about many things in life, especially about things that effect my health and well being with good dentistry being near the top of my list. I'm also in the healthcare industry. So I feel both informed and qualified to rank Dr. Mckenzie at the top.  He was comprehensive with this diagnostics, thorough with sharing and translating his findings and recommendations, and painlessly expert in this practice of drilling and filling some difficult cavities.  High marks from this picky patient, is a top rating indeed.

originalText.text: Dr. McKenzie is professional and knowledgeable.  He explains all to the patient and makes certain one is comfortable/okay. , I had gone to a dentist who was unable to numb me for a cavity filling that had cracked.  Since then, I fear getting any filling and I shared this with Dr. McKenzie.  He reassured me I would be okay, plus properly numb. üëçüèΩüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ  Thank you!  My go to dentist.

originalText.text: Dr. McKenzie is a highly-skilled, professional, and knowledgeable dentist. During my visit for a dental crown modeling, he was not only so proficient in the precedure, but also explained the procedure thoroughly and addressed all my concerns. Based on my experience, I highly recommend Dr. McKenzie for his expertise and excellent patient care.

Based on my experience, I highly recommend Dr. McKenzie for his expertise and excellent patient care.

originalText.text: Dentist is skilled, clear and easy to talk to. Office is run very efficiently; I never wait for more than a couple of minutes and reception staff is fantastic. Hygienists are wonderful. The other day I went at the wrong time and they were still able to see me.  Highly recommend.
